help.description: Prints list of commands and supported arguments. If argument 'command' is provided will display detailed information about the command along with examples.

cmc.description: Fetch CoinMarketCap ticker information. Alternatively, use the ticker itself as command.
cmc.example: !cmc powr, OR, !cmc power ledger, OR, !powr (shorthand for '!cmc powr')

balance.description: Check your account balance. Supported addresses/chains: HALO & ETH. Address keywords: 'reward pool', 'charity', 'h-eth'. If not address supplied, the first item of user's address book will be used. To get balance of a specific item from address book just type the index number of the address.
balance.example: !balance 0x1234567890abcdef OR, !balance OR, !balance 2 (for 2nd item in the address book)

tokens.description: Lists all tokens supported on HaloDEX

mn.description: Shows masternode collateral, reward pool balances, nodes distribution, last payout and ROI based on last payout.

halo.description: Get a digest of information about Halo.

guildcmd.example: !guildcmd add sayhello Hello Discord OR, !guildcmd remove sayhello

nodes.description: Lists masternodes owned by a specific address

dexbalance.description: Shows user's HaloDEX balances. USE YOUR HALO CHAIN ADDRESS FOR ALL TOKEN BALANCES WITHIN DEX.

orders.description: Get HaloDEX orders by user address.

address.description: Add, remove and get list of saved addresses.

alert.description: Enable/disable automatic alerts. Alert types: payout. Actions:on/off
